result.name: school-direct-application-system
result.notes: This system is used by applicants to apply to schools for School Direct places in initial teacher training. It contains information about the applicant and schools delivering School Direct places.

organization.name: national-college-for-teaching-and-leadership
organization.title: National College for Teaching and Leadership
organization.description: Created on 1 April 2013, when the "National College  for Leadership of Schools and Children's Services" merged with the "Teaching Agency" to become the "National College for Teaching and Leadership".

result.title: School Direct Application System

extras.value: Schools and ITT provider users can access and view data on this system. National College for Teaching and Leadership intend to publish statistics from this system in due course. The system closed December 2012 and functionality transferred to UCAS.
